item.title: Dumped rubbish suitcase, 31st January
item.description:
Suitcase and clothing on the corner of the carpark and foot path. The footpath runs along by St George's school. The pathway often has a lot of rubbish. Well Way Triangle Greening Group look after the plant island beside the carpark.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 32inch pothole on Warwick rd, 31st January
item.description:
This pothole has been reported, but is increasing in size rapidly - the road surface is visibly breaking up every time someone passes, or it rains. It's trebled in size over the past 2 weeks & no sign of any action at all. The road is now covered with debris from the hole. I measured it this morning at 32in long
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Warwick Road, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Commercial tow truck parked in same place for 8 weeks, 31st January
item.description:
A commercial vehicle has been parked and unmoved on my street since the beginning of December. As Bowater place is one of the only streets in the borough without parking restrictions people are parking and leaving their vehicles on the road for months/weeks and residents cannot park near their own homes. This pick up truck takes up 2 spaces that could be otherwise used by residents of the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lizban Street, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet
